modName: Gabriella standalone voiced follower High Elf
summary:
Hight elf Gabriella. Dialogues of partners by phrases from game, comments in fight are sounded, at murder of enemies,
at detection of a corpse, in dangerous locations, in the house of the player will support a friendly
chat if you get sick that will remind you of yours health.
descriptionHtml:
Gabriella
[url=http://radikal.ru/big/c9d1793e146842da96b3d7a63ee2a1a1][img]http://s011.radikal.ru/i315/1604/3e/f7cbecafb93d.jpg[/img][/url]
 Above Riverwood, in a grey mansion, an evil sorcerer holds captive the High Elf Gabriella. She needs a Knight in Shining Armour to release her! Or perhaps you, the Dragonborn can be her hero? In return she will devote herself as your companion in your travels, and her house becomes a simple player home for you. Gabriella is a standalone companion using the CBBE HDT (Curvy) body, with the option of using Mature Skin textures. She is not a thin waif, Gabriella is an  High Elf bound to nature in her curvy feminine lines. And she comes with Bodyslide files so you can dress her appropriately! 
Speaking vanilla dialogue by using arranged phrases from the game, Gabriella will converse in Russian with you, other companions, comment in battle as she murders your enemies, detect corpses, comment on dangerous locations, hum a little tune or two, and chat to you.
She has her own weapons, change magic, restoration and destruction magic, light armour and archery. She is an excellent archer. You can find a bow and daggers at her home that hold special enchantments, along with a Spell Book for a new spell, "The Clearing Flame". If you use EFF you can teach her magic spells.  She will also help to restore your health.
 Music:
Equip your mace and open her menu, close it and wait (you can put your mace away now!), and one of three music compositions will play, "I thought", "Walking in the Air" or "Longs" in traditional / rock arrangements. Gabriella will sandbox while her music plays, if an opportunity is nearby.
(Re-equip mace and converse with her to stop the music early).

18 sounded scenes of dialogues with NPC.

 Player  equipping a dagger at home will activate some extra comments from her.
After marriage there will also be some declarations of her love for you, as a love song.
 Location:
Head east out of Riverwood up the mountain path, and find her house on your left. Once you release her, her Solitude-style house becomes yours as a player home. Note - while it has two spare beds it is not for Hearthfire Adoptions. Gabriella will speak English / your chosen game language until she becomes your companion, after that her dialogue is in Russian. For non-Russian speakers, use the in-game subtitles to translate!

An option replaces 50 Rusian spoken lines with English vanila version.
Two types of HDT body are now available
Known Conflicts:
Cerwiden 
 Requirements:
1.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url] skeleton
 2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide2[/url]
